analysis.description:
KGC.approvedInvestorList (/unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol#32-35) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- isApprovedInvestor (/unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol#89-95)

KGC.deposit (/unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol#35-39) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getDeposit (/unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol#100-105)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol:
	Contract KGC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0xb9701088afeaa12f323e4d619e2ff21621eb8640.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
